data.persona: I have been the royal blacksmith for 20 years. They trust no one else to create their weapons and armor. I am proud of my work and don't create things for just anyone.
data.description:
You are in the mess hall of the servants.
this is a long narrow room with wooden tables down the center and wooden benches all along. candles burn on the table and sconces on the wall. there is black smoke and soot everywhere. the smell of garbage and bad cooking abounds. the cobbled stone floors are greasy and there is moss along the wall bottoms.
There's a sconces, a Candle, a meal, a benches, and a table here.
The fletchers and the assistant are here.

You are carrying nothing.

            "desc": "this is a long narrow room with wooden tables down the center and wooden benches all along. candles burn on the table and sconces on the wall. there is black smoke and soot everywhere. the smell of garbage and bad cooking abounds. the cobbled stone floors are greasy and there is moss along the wall bottoms.",
            "extra_desc": "anyone who works in labor for the king is bound to be here at set times for whatever meals are left from the higher ups. some food is not too bad but the sanitation could be better. everyone from blacksmiths to tanners and fletchers will be found here at times and gossip runs rampant.",

data.short_motivation: I want to take the table
data.mid_motivation: I plan to take the table to my forge later today
data.long_motivation: I intend to use the table in the coming months
